verses.kjv: Lord, how are they increased that trouble me! many are they that rise up against me.
verses.ct: LORD, my enemies keep growing in number! So many are turning against me.

verses.kjv: Many there be which say of my soul, There is no help for him in God. Selah.
verses.ct: So many are saying about me, 'God won't rescue him.' Selah.

verses.kjv: But thou, O LORD, art a shield for me; my glory, and the lifter up of mine head.
verses.ct: But you, LORD, are a shield around me; you are my glory, the one who lifts my head high.

verses.kjv: I cried unto the LORD with my voice, and he heard me out of his holy hill. Selah.
verses.ct: I called out to the LORD, and he answered me from his holy hill. Selah.

verses.kjv: I laid me down and slept; I awaked; for the LORD sustained me.
verses.ct: I lay down and fell asleep, and I woke up again, because the LORD kept me safe.

verses.kjv: I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people, that have set themselves against me round about.
verses.ct: I will not be afraid of 10,000 people who have surrounded me on every side.

verses.kjv: Arise, O LORD; save me, O my God: for thou hast smitten all mine enemies upon the cheek bone; thou hast broken the teeth of the ungodly.
verses.ct: Rise up, LORD! Rescue me, my God! You have struck all my enemies across the jaw; you have shattered the teeth of the wicked.

verses.kjv: Salvation belongeth unto the LORD: thy blessing is upon thy people. Selah.
verses.ct: Salvation comes from the LORD; your blessing rests on your people. Selah.
